name: 陳柏端
objective:
Learning objectives: to learn how to use mathematical tools to solve engineering problems, as well as the ability to analyze and interpret data. And then have the ability to apply mathematics, science and engineering knowledge.
Ordinary Differential Equations, Laplace Transforms, Power Series, Linear Algebra, Matrices.
schedule:
1　　　　Review of calculus
2　　　　First order ordinary differential equation; exact ODE, linear ODE
3　　　　First order ordinary differential equation; basic concept, separable ODE
4　　　　Second order ordinary differential equation; homogeneous linear ODE
5　　　　high order ordinary differential equation; nonhomogeneous ODE
6　　　　Midterm
7　　　　Power series
8　　　　Power series
9　　　　Bessel function and Legendre function
10　　　　Boundary valued problems
11　　　　Systems of linear equation
12　　　　Midterm
13　　　　Linear transformation and eigenvalue problems
14　　　　Laplace transform
15　　　　Fourier transform and Fourier series
16　　　　LT and FT to solve ODE
17　　　　Some applications of ODE in chemical engineering
18　　　　Final exam
scorePolicy:
1st midterm 30%
2nd midterm 30%
Final exam 30%
Class performance 10%

Advanced Engineering Mathematics 10/E
